channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Folketinget

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for Ritzau, 10–16 December 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:

  • Kristendemokraterne: 0 seats
  • Nye Borgerlige: 0–4 seats

  • Alternativet: 3.4–5.4%
  • Radikale Venstre: 4.2–6.4%
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti: 3.9–6.1%
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti: 3.8–6.0%
  • Kristendemokraterne: 0.5–1.6%
  • Nye Borgerlige: 1.0–2.3%
